title: Soil bioscience for sustainable food security
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The partnership award is in its early staged. I have visited research experts in Guangzhou to prepare for future collaborations. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Education,Environment,Security and Diplomacy
findingsText: This BBSRC UK-China Partnering award is in its early days. We have made some exchanges between UK and Chinese soil scientists and a new PhD student has started. The research is ongoing and therefore outcomes are not concluded. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Education,Environment,Security and Diplomacy,Other
